Class WaitTouchSensor

  • java.lang.Object
    • WaitTouchSensor

  • public class WaitTouchSensor
extends java.lang.Object
    WaitTouchSensor, used to wait an action on a touch sensor. In the LEGO Mindstorms environment is represented by the orange block "Wait".

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static byte CLICKED
      Identifies the clicked button action (pressed and released).
      static byte PRESSED
      Identifies the pressed button action.
      static byte RELEASED
      Identifies the released button action.
      protected static long WAIT_TIME
      Constant that defines the time to wait (in milliseconds) before making a new check to finish the wait.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      WaitTouchSensor(SensorPort sensorPort, byte waitAction)
      Constructor method, defines the action to wait and the port where the touch sensor is connected.
      WaitTouchSensor(TouchSensor touchSensor, byte waitAction)
      Constructor method, defines the action to wait and the touch sensor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void buttonClickedAction()
      Method that wait for the click of the button (pressed and released).
      protected void buttonPressedAction()
      Method that wait for the pression of the button.
      protected void buttonReleasedAction()
      Method that wait for the release of the button.
      TouchSensor getTouchSensor()
      Get the touch sensor.
      byte getWaitAction()
      Get the wait action.
      boolean isPressedButton()
      Method that tells if the sensor is pressed.
      void setTouchSensor(TouchSensor touchSensor)
      Set the touch sensor.
      void setWaitAction(byte waitAction)
      Set the comparison wait action checking that the wait action is valid.
      void waitTouch()
      Main method that finishes the wait based on the wait action.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
